channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Landskape AI

item.title: Drawing tickets from a canvas
item.description: Ongoing Project Abstract In this work, we analyze more efficient way of drawing winning tickets using importance sampling in an anytime learning regime. We further aim to do conclusive studies on the uniqueness of the winning tickets discovered by the algorithm in comparison to conventional pruning and LTH techniques. References: [1] Frankle, Jonathan, and Michael Carbin. “The lottery ticket hypothesis: Finding sparse, trainable neural networks.” arXiv preprint arXiv:1803.03635 (2018). [2] Paul, Mansheej, Surya Ganguli, and Gintare Karolina Dziugaite.

item.title: Robustness Survey of Graph Neural Networks
